paragraphs: This mini-site is a demonstration of a SPA (single-page application) I am creating using AngularJS.
For a more complex page that illustrates responsive web design, see the profiles page.
I have listed a bunch of useful resources I have found along the way.
And for further information describing technical capabilities this site illustrates, see about.
The full source is available on github.
Note: this is a work in progress; you can see what's in the pipeline.
